The app logs call duration to assist in professional time management and to provide users with insights into their communication patterns.
Access to the call log enables us to timestamp communication activities, aiding in professional record-keeping and facilitating a more organized and efficient workflow.
We prioritize the security and privacy of your call log information. This data is treated with the utmost confidentiality and is utilized exclusively for the professional purposes outlined in this privacy policy
